titleStmt.title: An appeal to Scripture & antiquity in the questions of 1. the worship and invocation of saints and angels 2. the worship of images 3. justification by and merit of good works 4. purgatory 5. real presence and half-communion : against the Romanists / by H. Ferne ...
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
